issue.title: Force Transifex to report an error if a placeholder is modified
issue.body:
Via organization settings we could make Transifex force translators to preserve placeholders `%s`, `%n`, `%1`, `%2` etc. Docs: - [Setting Translation Checks](https://docs.transifex.com/translation-checks/setting-translation-checks) - [Translation checks behavior](https://docs.transifex.com/translation-checks/introduction-to-translation-checks) This change could reduce (eliminate?) the format specifiers mismatch rate:
update-translations.py log excerpt

``` bitcoin_bs.ts: Mismatch between 'Can vary +/- %1 satoshi(s) per input.' and 'Može varirati +/-% 1 satoshi (a) po upisu vrijednosti.' bitcoin_hu.ts: Mismatch between 'Error: Disk space is low for %s' and 'Hiba: kevés a hely a lemezen!' bitcoin_fi.ts: Mismatch between '%1 to '%2'' and '% 1 - '% 2'' bitcoin_fi.ts: Mismatch between 'Are you sure you wish to close the wallet %1?' and 'Haluatko varmasti sulkea lompakon <|> % 1 <|>?' bitcoin_fi.ts: Mismatch between 'Invalid P2P permission: '%s'' and 'Virheellinen P2P-lupa: '% s'' bitcoin_fi.ts: Mismatch between 'Section [%s] is not recognized.' and 'Kohtaa [% s] ei tunnisteta.' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between 'Creating Wallet %1...' and '正在產生錢包 1％ ...' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between 'Discard blocks after verification, except most recent %1 GB (prune)' and '驗證後丟棄區塊，最新的％1 GB（修剪）除外' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between '%1 is currently syncing. It will download headers and blocks from peers and validate them until reaching the tip of the block chain.' and '％1 當前正在同步。它將從同級下載區塊頭和區塊，並對其進行驗證，直到到達區塊鏈的頂為止。' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between 'Creates a Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) for use with e.g. an offline %1 wallet, or a PSBT-compatible hardware wallet.' and '產生一個部分簽名的比特幣交易（PSBT）以用於例如離線％1錢包或與PSBT相容的硬體錢包。' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between 'Please, review your transaction proposal. This will produce a Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) which you can copy and then sign with e.g. an offline %1 wallet, or a PSBT-compatible hardware wallet.' and '請檢查您的交易提案。這將產生部分簽名的比特幣交易（PSBT），您可以複製該交易，然後進行簽名。離線％1錢包或與PSBT-相容的硬體錢包。' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between 'Are you sure you wish to close the wallet %1?' and '您確定要關閉錢包％1 嗎？' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between 'Could not find asmap file %s' and '找不到asmap 檔案 ％s' bitcoin_zh_TW.ts: Mismatch between 'Could not parse asmap file %s' and '無法解析asmap檔案 ％s' bitcoin_fa.ts: Mismatch between 'Show the %1 help message to get a list with possible Bitcoin command-line options' and 'برای دریافت لیستی از گزینه های خط فرمان بیت کوین ، پیام راهنمایی٪ 1 را نشان دهید' bitcoin_fa.ts: Mismatch between 'Wallet needed to be rewritten: restart %s to complete' and 'کیف پول احتیاج به بازنویسی دارد . راه اندازی مجدد و تکمیل کنید.' bitcoin_fa.ts: Mismatch between 'Error: Disk space is low for %s' and 'خطا: فضای دیسک کم است!' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 behind' and '%១ នៅពីក្រោយ' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Last received block was generated %1 ago.' and 'ប៊ុកដែលបានទទួលចុងក្រោយត្រូវបានបង្កើត %១កន្លងរួចមកហើយ។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 client' and '%១ អតិថិជន' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Warning: %1' and 'ក្រើនរំលឹកឲ្យប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នៈ %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Date: %1 ' and 'ថ្ងៃ %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Amount: %1 ' and 'ចំនួនៈ%១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Wallet: %1 ' and 'កាបូបអេឡិចត្រូនិចៈ %១ ' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Type: %1 ' and 'ប្រភេទៈ%១ ' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Label: %1 ' and ' ផ្លាកសញ្ញាៈ %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Address: %1 ' and 'អាសយដ្ឋាន} %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '(%1 locked)' and '(%១បានចាក់សោរ)' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'change from %1 (%2)' and 'ផ្លាស់ប្តូរពី %១ (%២)' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Creating Wallet %1...' and 'ការបើកកាបូបអេឡិចត្រូនិច %១...' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'The entered address "%1" is not a valid Bitcoin address.' and 'អាសយដ្ឋានដែលបានបញ្ចូល ៉​%១ ៉​គឺមិនមែនជាអាសយដ្ឋានត្រឹមត្រូវរបស់ប៊ីតខញ។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Address "%1" already exists as a receiving address with label "%2" and so cannot be added as a sending address.' and 'អាសយដ្ឋាន ៉​%១​ ៉​ មាននៅក្នុងអាសយដ្ឋានសម្រាប់ទទួលដែលមានស្លាកសញ្ញា ៉​%២​​ ៉ ដូច្នេះមិនអាចបញ្ចូលជាអាសយដ្ឋាសម្រាប់បញ្ចូន។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'The entered address "%1" is already in the address book with label "%2".' and 'អាសយដ្ឋានបានបញ្ចូល ​ ៉​%១ ៉ គឺមាននៅក្នុងសៀវភៅអាសយដ្ឋានដែលមានស្លាកសញ្ញា ៉​​​%២ ៉​។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Directory already exists. Add %1 if you intend to create a new directory here.' and 'ទីតាំងផ្ទុកទិន្នន័យមានរួចរាល់។ បន្ថែម %១ ប្រសិនបើអ្នកចង់បង្កើតទីតាំងផ្ទុកទិន្នន័យថ្មីនៅទីនេះ។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'About %1' and 'ប្រហែល %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Welcome to %1.' and 'សូមស្វាគមន៏ទៅកាន់ %១។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'As this is the first time the program is launched, you can choose where %1 will store its data.' and 'កម្មវិធីនេះត្រូវបានដាក់ឲ្យដំណើរការជាលើកដំបូង ដូច្នេះអ្នកអាចជ្រើសរើស%១ នឹងរក្សាផ្ទុកទិន្នន័យ។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Opening Wallet %1...' and 'ការបើកកាបូបអេឡិចត្រូនិច %១...' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Automatically start %1 after logging in to the system.' and 'ចាប់ផ្តើម %១ ដោយស្វ័យប្រវត្តិបន្ទាប់ពីបានចូលក្នុងប្រពន្ធ័។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '&Start %1 on system login' and '&ចាប់ផ្តើម %១ ទៅលើការចូលប្រពន្ធ័' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Invalid payment address %1' and 'អាសយដ្ឋានទូរទាត់ប្រាក់មិនត្រឹមត្រូវ %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Enter a Bitcoin address (e.g. %1)' and 'បញ្ចូលអាសយដ្ឋាន Bitcoin (ឧទាហរណ៏ %១)' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 ms' and '%១ នាទី' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 and %2' and '%១​ នឹង %២' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 B' and '%១​ ប៊ៃ' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 KB' and '%១គីឡូប៊ៃ' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 MB' and '%១​ មេហ្គាប៊ៃ' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 GB' and '%១ ជីហ្គាប៊ៃ' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 didn't yet exit safely...' and '%១ មិនបានចាកចេញដោយសុវត្ថភាពនៅឡើយ...' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Use up and down arrows to navigate history, and %1 to clear screen.' and 'ប្រើក្តារចុច ខាងក្រោម និង ខាងលើ ដើម្បីស្វែងរកប្រវត្តិ និង %១ ដើម្បីសំអាតកញ្ចក់។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Type %1 for an overview of available commands.' and 'វាយ%១សម្រាប់​ ការពិនិត្យពាក្យបង្គាប់បញ្ជារដែលមាន។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Executing command using "%1" wallet' and 'ប្រត្តិបត្តិបញ្ចារដោយប្រើ​ ៉​%១​​ ៉ កាបូបអេឡិចត្រូនិច' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Request payment to %1' and 'សំណើរសុំទូរទាត់ប្រាក់ដល់​ %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 to %2' and '%១​ ទៅ %២' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'The total exceeds your balance when the %1 transaction fee is included.' and 'ចំនួនសរុបលើសសមតុល្យរបស់អ្នកនៅពេលដែលកម្រៃប្រត្តិបត្តិការ%១ត្រូវបានបូកបញ្ចូល។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'A fee higher than %1 is considered an absurdly high fee.' and 'កម្រៃខ្ពស់ជាង %១ ចាត់ទុកថាតម្លៃមិនសមស្រប។​' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 is shutting down...' and '%១ កំពុងបិទ...' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1/unconfirmed' and '%១ មិនទាន់បានបញ្ចាក់' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between '%1 confirmations' and '%១​ ការបញ្ចាក់' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Details for %1' and 'លម្អិត %១' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Confirming (%1 of %2 recommended confirmations)' and 'កំពុងបញ្ចាក់(%១ នៃ %២ សេចក្តីបញ្ចាក់ដែលបានណែនាំ)' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Confirmed (%1 confirmations)' and 'បានបញ្ចាក់(%១ បញ្ចាក់)' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'There was an error trying to save the transaction history to %1.' and 'មានបញ្ហាមួយក្នុងការព្យាយាមរក្សាទុកប្រវត្តិប្រត្តិបត្តិការ %១។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'The transaction history was successfully saved to %1.' and 'ប្រវត្តប្រត្តិបត្តិការបានទទួលជោគជ័យ និង​បានរក្សាទុក %១។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Are you sure you wish to close the wallet %1?' and 'អ្នកពិតជាប្រាកដថា អ្នក​ចង់បិទកាបូបអេឡិចត្រូនិច%១?' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'There was an error trying to save the wallet data to %1.' and 'មានបញ្ហាក្នុងការព្យាយាម រក្សាទុកទិន្ន័យកាបូបអេឡិចត្រូនិច %១។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'The wallet data was successfully saved to %1.' and 'ទិន្ន័យកាបូបអេឡិចត្រូនិច ត្រូវបានរក្សាទុកដោយជោគជ័យ %១។' bitcoin_km.ts: Mismatch between 'Invalid amount for -maxtxfee=: '%s' (must be at least the minrelay fee of %s to prevent stuck transactions)' and 'ចំនួនមិនត្រឹមត្រូវសម្រាប់ -maxtxfee=:'%'(វាចាំបាច់ត្រូវតែកម្រៃតូចបំផុតត្រឹម %s ដើម្បីការពារជាប់គាំងដំណើរការប្រត្តិបត្តិការ)' bitcoin_ko.ts: Mismatch between 'Discard blocks after verification, except most recent %1 GB (prune)' and '가장 최근의 % 1GB를 제외하고 확인 후 블록 폐기 (제거)' bitcoin_ko.ts: Mismatch between '%1 is currently syncing. It will download headers and blocks from peers and validate them until reaching the tip of the block chain.' and '% 1이 (가) 현재 동기화 중입니다. 피어에서 헤더와 블록을 다운로드하고 블록 체인의 끝에 도달 할 때까지 유효성을 검사합니다.' bitcoin_ko.ts: Mismatch between 'Creates a Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) for use with e.g. an offline %1 wallet, or a PSBT-compatible hardware wallet.' and '오프라인 % 1 지갑 또는 PSBT-호환 하드웨어 지갑을 위해 "부분적으로 서명 된 비트 코인 트랜잭션 (PSBT)"을 생성합니다. ' bitcoin_ko.ts: Mismatch between 'Please, review your transaction proposal. This will produce a Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) which you can copy and then sign with e.g. an offline %1 wallet, or a PSBT-compatible hardware wallet.' and '거래 제안을 검토하십시오. 이것은 오프라인 % 1 지갑 또는 PSBT 호환 하드웨어 지갑을 PSBT (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction)가 생성되어 저장하거나 복사 한 다음 예를 들어 서명 할 수 있습니다.' bitcoin_ko.ts: Mismatch between 'Unknown address type '%s'' and '알수없는 주소 형식 '% s'' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between '&About %1' and 'Hakkında' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between '%1 behind' and 'arkasında' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'Show the %1 help message to get a list with possible Bitcoin command-line options' and 'Olası Bitcoin komut satırı seçeneklerinin listesini almak için% 1 yardım mesajını gösterin' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'Address "%1" already exists as a receiving address with label "%2" and so cannot be added as a sending address.' and '"% 1" adresi, "% 2" etiketli bir alıcı adresi olarak zaten mevcut ve bu nedenle gönderen adresi olarak eklenemez.' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'The entered address "%1" is already in the address book with label "%2".' and 'Girilen "% 1" adresi zaten adres defterinde ''% 2" etiketli olarak bulunuyor.' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'Directory already exists. Add %1 if you intend to create a new directory here.' and 'Klasör zaten var. Burada yeni bir klasör oluşturmak istiyorsanız % 1 ekleyin.' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'When you click OK, %1 will begin to download and process the full %4 block chain (%2GB) starting with the earliest transactions in %3 when %4 initially launched.' and 'Tamam'a tıkladığınızda,% 1, % 4 ilk başlatıldığında % 3'teki ilk işlemlerden başlayarak % 4 blok zincirinin (% 2GB) tamamını indirmeye ve işlemeye başlayacak.' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'This initial synchronisation is very demanding, and may expose hardware problems with your computer that had previously gone unnoticed. Each time you run %1, it will continue downloading where it left off.' and 'Bu ilk senkronizasyon çok zahmetlidir ve bilgisayarınızda daha önce fark edilmeyen donanım sorunlarını ortaya çıkarabilir. % 1'i her çalıştırdığınızda, indirmeye kaldığı yerden devam edecek.' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'Discard blocks after verification, except most recent %1 GB (prune)' and 'En son% 1 GB (veri budama) hariç, doğrulamadan sonraki blokları atın' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between '%1 is currently syncing. It will download headers and blocks from peers and validate them until reaching the tip of the block chain.' and '% 1 şu anda senkronize ediliyor. Eşlerden başlıkları ve blokları indirecek ve blok zincirinin ucuna ulaşıncaya kadar bunları doğrulayacaktır.' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'Total Amount' and 'Toplam Tutar %1' bitcoin_tr.ts: Mismatch between 'Warning: Private keys detected in wallet {%s} with disabled private keys' and 'Uyarı: {% s} cüzdanında özel anahtarlarla devre dışı bırakılmış özel anahtarlar algılandı' Removing src/qt/locale/bitcoin_sah.ts, as it contains only 3 messages bitcoin_ka.ts: Mismatch between 'Syncing Headers (%1%)...' and 'სათაურების სინქრონიზაცია (% 1%) ' bitcoin_ka.ts: Parse error in translation for 'Proxy is enabled: %1': 'მარიონეტული 1 ჩართულია 1:1%' bitcoin_ka.ts: Mismatch between 'Show the %1 help message to get a list with possible Bitcoin command-line options' and 'აჩვენეთ% 1 დახმარების წერილი, რომ მიიღოთ სია Bitcoin– ის ბრძანების შესაძლო ვარიანტებთან ერთად' bitcoin_gu.ts: Mismatch between 'There was an error trying to save the address list to %1. Please try again.' and 'સરનામાં સૂચિને 1 % પર સાચવવાનો પ્રયાસ કરતી વખતે એક ભૂલ આવી. મહેરબાની કરીને ફરીથી પ્રયતન કરો.' bitcoin_nb.ts: Mismatch between 'Error: Cannot parse configuration file: %1.' and 'Feil: Kan ikke analysere konfigurasjonsfilen:% 1.' bitcoin_nb.ts: Mismatch between 'To specify a non-default location of the data directory use the '%1' option.' and 'For å spesifisere en ikke-standardplassering av datakatalogen, bruk alternativet '% 1'.' bitcoin_nb.ts: Mismatch between 'To specify a non-default location of the blocks directory use the '%1' option.' and 'For å spesifisere en ikke-standardplassering for blokkeringsmappen bruker du alternativet '% 1'.' bitcoin_nb.ts: Mismatch between 'Creates a Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) for use with e.g. an offline %1 wallet, or a PSBT-compatible hardware wallet.' and 'Oppretter en delvis signert Bitcoin-transaksjon (PSBT) for bruk med f.eks. en offline% 1 lommebok eller en PSBT-kompatibel maskinvarelommebok.' bitcoin_nb.ts: Mismatch between ' from wallet '%1'' and 'fra lommebok '% 1'' bitcoin_nb.ts: Mismatch between '%1 to '%2'' and '% 1 til '% 2'' bitcoin_nb.ts: Mismatch between 'Please, review your transaction proposal. This will produce a Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction (PSBT) which you can copy and then sign with e.g. an offline %1 wallet, or a PSBT-compatible hardware wallet.' and 'Vennligst gjennomgå transaksjonsforslaget. Το όνομα αρχείου διπλότυπου -wallet καθορίστηκε.' bitcoin_el.ts: Mismatch between 'Warning: Private keys detected in wallet {%s} with disabled private keys' and 'Προειδοποίηση: Ιδιωτικά κλειδιά εντοπίστηκαν στο πορτοφόλι {% s} με απενεργοποιημένα ιδιωτικά κλειδιά' bitcoin_es.ts: Mismatch between 'There was an error trying to save the address list to %1. Please try again.' and 'Se produjo un error al intentar guardar la lista de direcciones en% 1. Inténtalo de nuevo.' bitcoin_he.ts: Parse error in translation for 'Warning: %1': 'אזהרה: 1%' bitcoin_he.ts: Mismatch between 'Creating Wallet %1...' and 'יוצר ארנק 1%...' ```

events.body: Enabled for XLIFF (ie, 22.0) as a warning only for now

> Enabled for XLIFF (ie, 22.0) as a warning only for now

Added `%6`, `%7`, `%8` and `%9`, as currently we use up to `%8`:

![Screenshot from 2021-06-04 02-06-07](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/120722976-74b68c80-c4d9-11eb-9971-caa9b0abaa6c.png)
Would this help prevent leading whitespaces with shortcuts, see #150

> Would this help prevent leading whitespaces with shortcuts, see #150

I don't think so.

The current settings seem ok.

Closing.
